name: Hot 'n' Spicy Buffalo Chicken Salad
author: Celeste
summary: If you like Buffalo Chicken Wings, you'll love this take on it.
ingredients: 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch cubes
1 tablespoon salad seasoning mix (such as McCormick® Salad Supreme Seasoning)
directions: In a small bowl, combine crumbled blue cheese and Ranch-style dressing; set aside
Season cubed chicken with salt and pepper
Heat a large skillet over high heat, and pour in the vegetable oil
Just before the oil starts to smoke, add the chicken
Cook to brown evenly, about 3 minutes
Reduce heat to low, and add butter, hot sauce, and salad seasoning mix
Simmer until chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes
Toss together the lettuce and Ranch-style dressing mixture in a large bowl
Top salad with chicken, and serve
